features.name: consanguinity
features.relevance: Strong genetic risk factor for neurodevelopmental disorders

features.name: family_neuro_history
features.description: Does the subject have a family history of neurological disorders?
features.relevance: High hereditary correlation with neurodevelopmental conditions

features.name: seizures_history
features.description: Has the subject ever had seizures or convulsions?

features.name: brain_injury_history
features.description: History of traumatic brain injury (TBI) or head trauma?
features.relevance: Known to increase risk of neurodevelopmental disorders

features.name: psychiatric_diagnosis
features.description: Diagnosed with any psychiatric disorder (depression, bipolar, etc.)?

features.name: substance_use
features.description: Does the subject consume psychoactive substances regularly?

features.name: birth_complications
features.description: Was the subject born with complications or low weight?
features.relevance: Birth complications are correlated with neurological risks

features.name: extreme_poverty
features.description: Does the subject live in extreme poverty?

features.name: education_access_issues
features.description: Has the subject ever had access restrictions to education?

features.name: healthcare_access
features.description: Does the subject have access to mental healthcare?
features.relevance: Lack of care increases long-term undetected conditions

features.name: suicide_ideation
features.description: History of suicide attempts or ideation?

features.name: psychotropic_medication
features.description: Is the subject on psychotropic or neurological medication?

features.name: disability_diagnosis
features.description: Has the subject ever been diagnosed with a disability?

features.name: social_support_level
features.description: Level of social support (isolated vs. supported)

features.name: gender
features.relevance: Some disorders have higher incidence by sex

features.name: breastfed_infancy
features.description: Was the subject breastfed during infancy?
features.relevance: Proxy for early nutrition and stimulation

features.name: violence_exposure
features.description: Exposure to violence or trauma (childhood or adulthood)?
